definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Any liquid could be solidified under the certain conditions.
sentences.chinese: 任何液体在一定条件下均可固化。

sentences.english: And this product is easy to apply pre-cure process for cleaning and rework.
sentences.chinese: 而其在预固化后易于清洗返工。

sentences.english: You can break through and challenge your crystallized patterns and mind-sets.
sentences.chinese: 你可以突破和挑战你的固化模式和心态。

sentences.english: The sponge in the cushion and the backrest are both manufactured by employing freeze foaming and forming techniques.
sentences.chinese: 座垫和靠背海绵均采用冷固化发泡成型技术制造。

sentences.english: It's a two-component amine adduct cured epoxy paint.
sentences.chinese: 一种双组份胺加成固化的环氧涂料。

sentences.english: Curing property of the adhesive was studied by thermal analysis.
sentences.chinese: 通过热分析，研究了该发泡胶的固化特性。

sentences.english: In addition, the CONSOLID stabilized soil can also have the use of recycled.
sentences.chinese: 此外，抗疏力固化土还具有可循环再生使用性。

sentences.english: The influences of cure accelerators to the synthesis of different polyesters are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了固化促进剂对不同配方聚酯合成的影响。

sentences.english: The first all-solid state tunable laser system has been developed successfully.
sentences.chinese: 第一台全固化可调谐激光系统已研制成功。

sentences.english: Solidification degree of PETN composite explosive would affect ultrasonic attenuation.
sentences.chinese: 介绍泰安混合炸药固化程度对超声波衰减的影响。

sentences.english: Suitable content of gypsum will be helpful to improve the strength of the soft soil solidified by the cement.
sentences.chinese: 适量的石膏掺入也有利于窑灰水泥固化土强度的提高。

sentences.english: Cure process of EAM resin was formulated.
sentences.chinese: 并制定了该树脂的固化工艺。

sentences.english: A technology of the concealed teeth correcting equipment is developed.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种基于光固化法的隐形牙齿矫治器的制作技术。

sentences.english: Desktop computer will be must develop toward fixable location and requirement way.
sentences.chinese: 台式电脑也必将朝着固化位置与需求的方向发展。

sentences.english: The material polymerizes and solidifies at the focused spots.
sentences.chinese: 该材料聚合并固化的聚焦点。

sentences.english: Cold solidifying surface anti-contamination agent of polished tile was prepared.
sentences.chinese: 本文研制了室温固化的抛光砖表面防污剂。

definition: to eliminate/to do away with/to get rid of
to peel/to strip/to peel off/to come off (of tissue, skin, covering etc)
